title: The 5 Coolest Ways to Wear a Hoodie
text: 1/5 Instagram/Men With Style The Company Man Hoodie Yes, you can still layer a hoodie under your tailored jacket or coat. The key is to opt for luxurious and fine yarns, like merino wool or cashmere. Make sure your top layer stays tailored and keep the refined vibe intact. 2/5 Instagram/Matiere The New-School Cool Hoodie Unexpected textures, like the French terry and Japanese kid wool combined here, put a new spin on a classic style. Wear it with a cropped bomber and slim pants to give the hoodie shape. The contrast color helps it stand out. 3/5 Instagram/Victor Cruz The Urban Athlete Hoodie For guys who like a modern edge to their athletic look. Layer dark hoodies like this with puffy jackets and geometric shapes. The simple palette helps it look clean and contemporary. 4/5 Instagram/Lululemon The Tech Cruncher Hoodie Cotton is comfortable, but it also absorbs sweat. When you need extra performance, opt for wicking fabrics in sleek shapes to help improve performance in the gym or on the road. Bonus: Your looks stays streamlined. 5/5 Image courtesy of Instagram/Voormi The Outdoorsy Hoodie Hoodies may have been adopted by the street, but theyâ€™re still at home on the trail. Worn under a helmet or a down vest, a functional merino wool layer like this keeps you warm in all kinds of conditions.
